content: a great starting point too is meditation — meditation is focus — to focus on breathing alone — to anchor your thought or focus to your breath — once you master this natural process you will be able to access this ATTENTION anytime of the day and night — Your phone must be there for your convenience…not others — if you reply in an instant to every person or a new relationship in your life, people will expect this all the time — take your own precious time to respond — Respect & peace
